amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption from the provisions of the bill for rules put forth by the FDA for the purposes of consumer safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to exempt from the bill rules put forth by the FDA for the purposes of consumer safety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 18).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 18).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Pocan.
